meanings.definition: To express great joy or happiness.
meanings.sent1: The children jubilated when they saw the colorful balloons at the party.
meanings.sent2: The crowd jubilated as the team scored the winning goal.
meanings.sent3: The puppy jubilated with wagging tail when its owner returned home.
meanings.sent4: The flowers in the garden jubilated under the warm sun.
meanings.sent5: The students jubilated after receiving their excellent exam results.

meanings.sent1: The town jubilated the arrival of the new year with fireworks and music.
meanings.sent2: The family jubilated the success of their business with a grand party.
meanings.sent3: The cat jubilated by chasing a butterfly around the garden.
meanings.sent4: The stars in the sky jubilated the night with their twinkling light.
meanings.sent5: The friends jubilated their reunion with laughter and hugs.
